parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The small and poorly located horn button on the steering yoke can cause delayed or failed horn activation in emergency situations, potentially leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Difficulty finding the horn button in an emergency
delayed horn activation
failure to activate the horn
instinctively hitting the center of the steering wheel instead of the horn button.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden and unexpected braking can cause accidents, especially if other vehicles are following closely behind.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly brakes hard without input from the driver
often when using adaptive cruise control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Various software issues can cause safety concerns, including problems with the touchscreen, autonomous driving features, and other critical systems.
symptoms: Issues with the 17-inch screen
including lack of tilt adjustment; problems with autonomous driving features
such as sudden braking; and other software-related issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A door opening while driving can cause accidents or distractions, potentially leading to crashes.
symptoms: The driver-side rear door opens while driving despite being locked.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Difficulty activating turn signals can lead to accidents or near-misses, especially when changing lanes or turning.
symptoms: Difficulty activating turn signals
especially when the wheel is not in a horizontal position; risk of activating the wrong direction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The yoke steering wheel design can cause accidents, near-misses, and driver frustration due to its non-intuitive layout, lack of tactile feedback, and awkward ergonomics.
symptoms: Difficulty using turn signals
horn
and wipers; accidental activation of features; reduced control during emergency maneuvers; fatigue and discomfort during driving; increased risk of accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The horn placement on the yoke steering wheel can lead to delayed or failed horn activation in emergency situations, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Difficulty finding and activating the horn; accidental activation of other features; delayed reaction time in emergency situations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The touch-based turn signal design can cause accidents, near-misses, and driver frustration due to its non-intuitive layout and lack of tactile feedback.
symptoms: Difficulty using turn signals; accidental activation of features; reduced visibility of turn signal indicators.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Power steering malfunction can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Warning message "GTW_w074 - Steering assist reduced - Steering may require increased effort"; difficulty steering; increased effort required to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden acceleration can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Unintended acceleration; failure to stop; damage to vehicle and surrounding property.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Phantom Braking Issues with Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) and Autopilot
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected braking of the vehicle can cause accidents, especially if there are vehicles behind, which can lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly brakes hard while using ACC or Autopilot
often without any apparent reason or obstruction in front of the vehicle. The braking can be severe
moderate
or light
and may occur multiple times during a single drive.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Warning and Display Issues with Full Self-Driving (FSD) Beta
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of warning and display issues with FSD Beta can lead to unsafe vehicle operation, particularly when the driver is unable to see critical safety-related displays.
symptoms: The vehicle's display does not provide adequate warning or display critical safety-related information
such as intended vehicle path
bollards
and driver annotations
which can lead to unsafe vehicle operation.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure of Autonomous Self-Driving Feature to Brake in Time
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the autonomous self-driving feature to brake in time can lead to accidents, especially if the vehicle is traveling at high speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to automatically brake in time
even when another vehicle is slowing down or stopped ahead
which can lead to accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering wheel and horn can lead to accidents or near-misses due to the inability to signal or alert other drivers.
symptoms: Blinkers on the steering wheel stop working
horn button is difficult to find and press
horn does not activate when pressing the center of the steering wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument panel and screen can cause the driver to lose critical information, such as speed, blind spots, and warnings, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Instrument panel screen goes blank
screen does not tilt towards the driver
making it difficult to see and access.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of safety features, such as pedestrian alert warning systems and emergency flashers, can increase the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Pedestrian alert warning system fails to activate
emergency flashers do not reliably activate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of Autopilot and software can cause unintended acceleration, loss of control, and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Autopilot system malfunctions
causing the vehicle to lurch forward and accelerate without driver input.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the HVAC system can cause discomfort and distraction, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: HVAC system malfunctions
causing the vehicle to become unbearably hot or cold.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear parking safety camera can increase the risk of accidents and injuries while parking or backing up.
symptoms: Rear parking safety camera fails to display
showing a green line on the screen.
